product_name: Platypus PlatyPreserve Wine Preservation System - 27 fl. oz.
long_description: Consider yourself a wine connoisseur? Then start protecting the flavor of your best bottles with the Platypus PlatyPreserve(TM) wine preservation system. PlatyPreserve extends the life of your wine by eliminating exposure to oxygen; exposure to oxygen over time can negatively affect the delicate flavors of wine. When stored in a PlatyPreserve container, wine can be enjoyed several days or even weeks later. Container is lightweight and packable so you can carry wine to the campsite or take it along to a picnic in the park. Lined with a food-grade polyethylene liner, the container is 100% BPA free. Container holds 27 fl. oz. (800ml) of liquid.
short_description: Consider yourself a wine connoisseur? Then start protecting the flavor of your best bottles with the Platypus PlatyPreserve(TM) wine preservation system.
